questions.question: What does a red traffic light signal mean?
questions.explanation: A red traffic light signal means stop. You can make a right turn after you stop unless a NO TURN ON RED sign is posted.

questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign indicate?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond-shaped signs are used to warn drivers of upcoming road conditions and hazards.

questions.question: What does a green traffic light signal mean?
questions.explanation: A green traffic light signal means go, but you must yield to any vehicle, bicycle, or pedestrian still in the intersection.

questions.question: What does a flashing red light signal mean?
questions.explanation: A flashing red light signal means stop. After stopping, you may proceed when it is safe, observing the right-of-way rules.

questions.question: What does a rectangular white sign with black lettering indicate?
questions.explanation: Rectangular white signs with black lettering provide important information about the rules of the road.

questions.question: When two vehicles arrive at an intersection at the same time, who has the right-of-way?
options: The vehicle that is moving faster
questions.explanation: At an intersection where there are no stop signs, yield signs, or traffic signals, drivers must yield to vehicles on the right.

questions.question: Who has the right-of-way at a T-intersection?
options: The vehicle on the through road
The vehicle on the road that ends
questions.correctAnswer: The vehicle on the through road
questions.explanation: At a T-intersection without signs or signals, the vehicle on the through road has the right-of-way.

questions.question: What is the maximum speed limit on a Connecticut highway under ideal conditions?
questions.explanation: Under ideal conditions, the maximum speed limit on a Connecticut highway is 65 mph.

questions.question: When should you use your high beam headlights?
options: When you are on a highway and there are no oncoming vehicles
questions.correctAnswer: When you are on a highway and there are no oncoming vehicles
questions.explanation: Use your high beam headlights when you are on a highway and there are no oncoming vehicles.

questions.question: What should you do when you are driving in heavy fog?
questions.explanation: In foggy conditions, you should use your low beam headlights to improve visibility.
